) AS s

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON i."CreatedBy" = u0."Id"
    WHERE i."Id" = @id
    LIMIT 1
) AS s

) AS s

) AS s

) AS i0

    SELECT i."Id", i."Advisory", i."Area", i."AssignedTo", i."CapturedAt", i."Category", i."ClosedAt", i."CreatedAt", i."CreatedBy", i."DeviceId", i."IncidentId", i."MediaUris", i."MlMetadata", i."Note", i."Plant", i."ResolvedAt", i."ServerIncidentId", i."Severity", i."Status", u."Id" AS "Id0", u."Company", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."Email", u."EmployeeId", u."FirstName", u."IsActive", u."LastLoginAt", u."LastName", u."PasswordHash", u."Phone", u."Role", u."SupervisorDepartmentIds", u0."Id" AS "Id1", u0."Company" AS "Company0", u0."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt1", u0."Email" AS "Email0", u0."EmployeeId" AS "EmployeeId0", u0."FirstName" AS "FirstName0", u0."IsActive" AS "IsActive0", u0."LastLoginAt" AS "LastLoginAt0", u0."LastName" AS "LastName0", u0."PasswordHash" AS "PasswordHash0", u0."Phone" AS "Phone0", u0."Role" AS "Role0", u0."SupervisorDepartmentIds" AS "SupervisorDepartmentIds0"
    FROM "Incidents" AS i
    LEFT JOIN "Users" AS u ON i."AssignedTo" = u."Id"
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u0 ON i."CreatedBy" = u0."Id"
    WHERE i."Id" = @id
    LIMIT 1
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT i0."Id", i0."Comment", i0."CreatedAt", i0."IncidentId", i0."UserId", u1."Id" AS "Id0", u1."Company", u1."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u1."Email", u1."EmployeeId", u1."FirstName", u1."IsActive", u1."LastLoginAt", u1."LastName", u1."PasswordHash", u1."Phone", u1."Role", u1."SupervisorDepartmentIds"
    FROM "IncidentComment" AS i0
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u1 ON i0."UserId" = u1."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."IncidentId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Id0", s."Id1", s0."Id"

WHERE i."Severity" IN ('High', 'Critical') AND i."Status" = 'Pending' AND i."CreatedAt" > now() + INTERVAL '-5 mins'

LEFT JOIN "Locations" AS l ON t."PlantLocationId" = l."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Locations" AS l0 ON t."AreaLocationId" = l0."Id"
ORDER BY t."CreatedAt" DESC

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON t."AssignedToUserId" = u."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Locations" AS l ON t."PlantLocationId" = l."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Locations" AS l0 ON t."AreaLocationId" = l0."Id"
ORDER BY t."CreatedAt" DESC
